<Heading
  as={'h1'}
  className={'openapi__heading'}
  children={'allOf with Shared Required Properties'}
></Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={'get'}
  path={'/allof-shared-required'}
  context={'endpoint'}
></MethodEndpoint>

Schema:

```yaml
allOf:
  - type: object
    properties:
      sharedProp:
        type: string
    required: [sharedProp]
  - type: object
    properties:
      anotherProp:
        type: number
    required: [anotherProp]
```

<ParamsDetails parameters={undefined}></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema title={'Body'} body={undefined}></RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{
    '200': {
      description: 'Successful response',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            allOf: [
              {
                type: 'object',
                properties: { sharedProp: { type: 'string' } },
                required: ['sharedProp'],
              },
              {
                type: 'object',
                properties: { anotherProp: { type: 'number' } },
                required: ['anotherProp'],
              },
            ],
          },
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></StatusCodes>
